suncertify.db

Class DBCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.db.DBCache

  • public class DBCache
extends java.lang.Object
    DBCache is the local cached copy of the database. It is used by the standalone and networed clients.
    Author:
    Robbie

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBCache

        public DBCache(java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<HotelRoom> records,
       java.lang.String[] fields)
        Constructor for DBCache. Takes a collection of HotelRooms and String array of record fields.
        Parameters:
        records - This is a CopyOnWriteArrayList of Room objects.
        fields - This is a String array of the field names for all records.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllRecords

        public java.util.List<HotelRoom> getAllRecords()
        Returns all available HotelRooms records from DBCache as a list.
        Returns:
        all available HotelRooms in DBCache.

        Returns:

        public HotelRoom readRecord(long recNo)
        Read the passed record from the DBCache.
        Parameters:
        recNo - to read
        Returns:
        The HotelRoom object related to the recNo passed

      • updateRecord

        public void updateRecord(long recNo,
                java.lang.String customer)
        Allows the passed record to be updated with the customer who booked the HotelRoom.
        Parameters:
        recNo - Record to update
        customer - Customer who has booked the room.

      • findByCriteria

        public long[] findByCriteria(java.lang.String[] criteria)
        Is used to find a HotelRoom by the name or location.
        Parameters:
        criteria - contains the name and/or the location to search for.
        Returns:
        Array of recNo that match the search criteria

      • isRecordInDBCache

        public boolean isRecordInDBCache(long recNo)
        Checks if record is in the DBCache
        Parameters:
        recNo - to check if in DBCache
        Returns:
        true if in DBCache, false otherwise

      • dumpCacheToFile

        public static void dumpCacheToFile()
        Used when server is shutdown. Writes the DBCache back to the db file.
